group.title: Shopping Catalog
group.description: Commerce Catalog - search. pdp, facets, etc

addToCartBehavior.title: Add to cart behavior
addToCartBehavior.description: Choose the action that occurs when the user adds an item to the cart.

addToCartFromFacetsView.title: Add to Cart from Facets View
addToCartFromFacetsView.description: Check this box to display an Add to Cart button on each search result.

promocodes.allowMultiples.title: Allow adding more than one promocode
promocodes.allowMultiples.description: Check this box to enable stackable promotions on your SCA site.

matrixchilditems.enabled.title: Allow custom matrix child search in the item list
matrixchilditems.enabled.description: Check this box to enable the custom matrix child item search within the Item list.

matrixchilditems.fieldset.title: Matrix child items fieldset for search
matrixchilditems.fieldset.description: Enter the fieldset used on the matrix item child search.

showTaxDetailsPerLine.title: If the information is available to your country, shows detailed taxes in the cart (per line) and Purchase History
showTaxDetailsPerLine.description: If the information is available to your country, check this box to show the per-line tax details in the Cart and purchase history.

isZoomEnabled.title: Enable Zoom for Images
isZoomEnabled.description: Enables zoom for Images in Product Detail page and Quick View modal.

summaryTaxLabel.title: Tax-type label
summaryTaxLabel.description: Select the tax-type label to display in the Cart's Order Summary.

priceLevel.enabled.title: Enable strike-through behavior
priceLevel.enabled.description: Compares a customer's configured price level with the default price level

priceLevel.default.title: Default price level
priceLevel.default.description: Specifies the default price level to compare to a customer's configured price level for strike-through pricing

isNewSearchApiEnabled.title: Enable new search API endpoints
isNewSearchApiEnabled.description: Check this box to enable the new search API endpoints.
